title: First General Body Meeting
description: Join us for our first meeting of the new school year.  We will start with an introduction to the team and its history, and then proceed to the lab to give a presentation of last year's progress.  We will then break into subteams where you will be given introductory training tasks to get you up to speed with our practices/environment.  Subsequent general body meetings will occur each Friday 6pm-8pm in CII 4040.
